appearance.caption: Enter an expression that will be evaluated. If the condition is met then the assigned actions for this condition will be processed. You can use new_opencall.field and old_opencall.fieldname. Treat it like doing a sql where clause. Alternatively just add simple conditions using the below controls.

controlInfo.name: Execute VPME Script (system sub processes only)
